db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates how to use a 2D layer as a 3D texture.

db:article.db:programlisting:
# Copyright (C) 2022 The Qt Company Ltd. # SPDX-License-Identifier: BSD-3-Clause
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16) project(dynamictexture LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
if(NOT DEFINED INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR) set(INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR "examples") endif()
set(INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR "${INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR}/quick3d/dynamictexture")
find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS Core Gui Quick Quick3D)
qt_add_executable(dynamictexture main.cpp )
set_target_properties(dynamictexture PROPERTIES WIN32_EXECUTABLE TRUE MACOSX_BUNDLE TRUE )
target_link_libraries(dynamictexture PUBLIC Qt::Core Qt::Gui Qt::Quick Qt::Quick3D )
qt_add_qml_module(dynamictexture URI Example VERSION 1.0 QML_FILES CorkBoards.qml Doors.qml main.qml content/Panel.qml RESOURCES meshes/door1.mesh meshes/door2.mesh meshes/wall.mesh content/cork.jpg content/note-yellow.png content/tack.png NO_RESOURCE_TARGET_PATH )
install(TARGETS dynamictexture RUNTIME DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" BUNDLE DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" LIBRARY DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" )
